title: Correction: Early mortality in tuberculosis patients initially lost to follow up following diagnosis in provincial hospitals and primary health care facilities in Western Cape, South Africa
content: by Muhammad Osman, Sue-Ann Meehan, Arne von Delft, Karen Du Preez, Rory Dunbar, Florian M. Marx, Andrew Boulle, Alex Welte, Pren Naidoo, Anneke C. Hesseling
author: Muhammad Osman
